instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Fl√¶skesteg?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Fl√¶skesteg? And Sm√∏rrebr√∏d.  Thanks.
Wow! Where do I start? Fl√¶skesteg [a whole roast pork leg with stuffing] is only possible in a small family. My family was too large for that. [But] it is always delicious. This year, we decided it was time to do an open house again, and we wanted to cook a fl√¶skesteg. It's really easy. It's simply a leg of pork, filled with a very special stuffing that you must follow. If you make it like we did, it's very good, because it's a pork leg. We boil it on Christmas Eve and we serve it the day after Christmas with crackling‚Äîbut not the crackling from the legs itself, because the skin isn't very good‚Äîand there is the stuffing. You eat this all day long, and the crackling is delicious. [You can prepare a similar meal] by simply baking a slice of ham or a loin of pork, but then, you wouldn't have the crackling.
But to serve this meal, you have to serve a couple of other things. First of all, you absolutely need one of the best kinds of red wine for it. There is a red wine that comes from N√∏rre√•dal in southwest Jutland, named Riesling N√∏rre√•dal. It is a very particular wine. I find it's impossible to make a good fl√¶skesteg that has only wine or only beer, but if you mix that with red wine, you will find that it gives it a special taste that you can't achieve just with beer. Because I have a friend who is a big wine drinker, he says, "N√∏rre√•dal is a wine, because there is no beer in existence that can give that taste."
And of course, you'll need some Danish cheese. I would recommend Danish Gammel Dansk, because it has that good smell and flavor that you can't get anywhere else. Of course, you can serve it with French or Danish Camembert. You can also serve some cheese called Oks (it's the Danish word for mushrooms), because it is an open, a bit dry cheese that has little specks of white [on it]. It's quite similar to the little white pieces of mushrooms, or a chanterelle, which you find in the Danish woods. The white specks on it are actually pieces of chanterelle‚Äîa little delicatessen on the cheese plate.
Also, the salad will be essential to go along with the Fl√¶skesteg. In this case, the salad is very important. You have to have a Danish open sandwich‚Äîvery simply, with a piece of butter and some Danish cheese on a good piece of Danish rye bread. That is essential‚Äîthat's the sm√∏rrebr√∏d [open [sandwiches]] we serve with the stuffed pork leg.
You can't eat pork leg if you don't eat salads. Even if you only eat salads and have nothing else, if the salads are good, you'll have a good meal. Of course, that will be a problem because you will just eat salad with crackling. So, you have to start by drinking a lot. Then, the whole pork is not that bad. [Laughs]
You might think that a whole pork leg is too much, but when you are with friends and family, I think [it is] better to eat two than to eat just one. You can only eat one whole pork leg, and that would ruin it for the following year. But you have to eat two and you'll be fine. The only problem is that sometimes, you can't eat two, because you are so full after the first. It's not that good; it's better to have some cheese and some wine.
Sometimes, it is better to cook things that don't take care of you too much. But I think a meal like what I described takes care of you for a very long time afterwards. And it is very special. It is like a family meal‚Äîa nice moment you can give your children. When you have all that in the house and you are going to serve a special meal, you usually serve a whole

instruction: Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra.
output:
Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra. What was it like, and tell me a story about it.
Ancient Egypt was a society dominated by men. Women‚Äôs contributions were generally excluded from the official historical record. In the last hundred years or so, however, historians have begun to uncover details of Egyptian women‚Äôs daily lives. By examining their daily lives‚Äîat least as much as we can do so‚Äîwe gain an understanding of both men‚Äôs and women‚Äôs roles in ancient Egyptian society.
One of the best ways to learn about the daily lives of women is through their works of art and their burial goods. The tomb of Senneferi, for example, reveals that Egyptian women played a major role in the creation of tombs for themselves and their families. This is one piece from Senneferi‚Äôs tomb, which shows her making offerings to the gods and showing the importance of the heart in Egyptian thought.
Of course, the image of women in ancient Egyptian art is limited by the ancient Egyptians‚Äô understanding of women‚Äôs physical features. By studying ancient Egyptian burial goods, we can learn more about the role gender played in the ancient society.
Skeletons from ancient Egypt tend to be smaller than those of people living today (see this example). This suggests that many Egyptians lived under the threat of famine. The skeletal remains of Egyptian women and children at the time of Egypt‚Äôs collapse around 1075 to 1070 B.C.E. show that they had the physical appearance of ‚Äúlittle old men, very undernourished, and bent double.‚Äù This suggests to some scholars that Egypt‚Äôs collapse was caused by a prolonged drought, which limited the availability of food and forced small physical frames onto all members of society.
Another way to learn about Egyptian women is through their work. Egyptian women did many things, even doing the same jobs as men. For example, in addition to many different jobs, men and women did different pieces of work. Work related to farming typically was done by men, whereas cleaning and cooking was a job women did. Although ancient Egyptian women worked outside of the home, they still focused primarily upon household work. This is one tomb painting showing a pharaoh‚Äôs daughter working outside the house in the royal gardens.
Another way Egyptian women worked was through the production of goods in their homes. One example of this is the production of linen and clothing. These people are spinning linen in their Egyptian home. This is a painting from a tomb in the Valley of the Kings showing work in the textile industry.
There were many different women‚Äôs professions in ancient Egypt. The women shown here are workers in an Egyptian silk factory in the third century B.C.E.
In many women‚Äôs families there was at least one boy to do the work. It was not surprising since most people did not live long and girls rarely survived beyond puberty. It is most likely that the ‚Äúlittle old men‚Äù referred to earlier were the boys who came after her. By her age the boys would be doing the work since they were bigger than their sisters.
All women were expected to give birth. The most common form was that she would give birth to a son, but women also played an important role in bringing forth daughters, which were highly valuable in Egyptian society.
In addition to raising their children, the housework and production of goods, there were a variety of public jobs that Egyptian women could hold. Here is one tomb painting showing women who had been educated and who had jobs as scribes. They sit behind desks and write on papyrus sheets in the presence of a pharaoh.
These women could also study and become priests, priestesses, or temple servants. The men in charge of Egyptian temples typically taught their wives and daughters the religious knowledge that was vital to their work as priests. This is a drawing showing the goddess Mut from the Temple of Mut at the site of modern-day Karnak. In the New Kingdom, Egyptians held festivals in which they would carry the image of this goddess from the temple on the east bank of the Nile to that of her husband on the west bank.
There were also a limited number of political roles available to Egyptian women. They could be the queen‚Äôs chief overseer of women, called the ‚ÄúGreat Wife,‚Äù or the head of the state‚Äôs female administrative officials, called the ‚ÄúSupervisor of Women.‚Äù This is a relief showing the ‚ÄúSupervisor of Women‚Äù (left), and the ‚ÄúGreat Wife‚Äù (right).
There were many special women in Ancient Egypt.

instruction: Hi, I'm in the mood for a Bloody Mary. Can you give me a recipe for making one?
output:
Hi, I'm in the mood for a Bloody Mary. Can you give me a recipe for making one?
Saturday, November 23, 2019 9:10:56 AM EDT
Mary Jo M.
I am sure that this Bloody Mary (below) would be pretty good; since I wasn't in the mood and the night was late and after a long day of work, I did not try this recipe but I did modify it a little. If I do try this recipe, I will give you a full report.
This is how I modified the original recipe.
1 bottle (275 ml) of V8 V-Fusion, or any other mixer that contains Vegetal Fiber.
2.5 ounces (75 ml) of Gordon‚Äôs Gin or similar.
1.5 ounces (45 ml) of Hendrick‚Äôs Gin or similar.
3/4 ounce (22 ml) of fresh tomato juice. I prefer to use the tomato juice that is in the market; I am not into making one from scratch unless it is absolutely necessary.
1/2 ounce (15 ml) Worcestershire Sauce. I do prefer using Lea & Perrins Worcestershire Sauce from Great Britain.
8-10 drops of Tabasco Sauce or similar (I prefer the one from Tabasco).
1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon of celery salt, or similar.
1 pinch or so of salt.
Mix the tomato juice with the dry tomatoes, Worcestershire sauce and a few drops of tabasco.
Add the gin and a few dashes of celery salt. Mix well.
Fill with ice, add vodka and then garnish with a lime and some celery, oyster crackers or some salted peanuts.
This recipe was from the book by the same title, The Bloody Mary Bible, by Matt Robins and published in 2009 by The Lyons Press. I have the 2015 edition and have tried a few recipes from the book.
This book gives you recipes from all over the world and provides you with history and background information, photos and many different drink variations and tips for creating the perfect Bloody Mary. In my opinion, this is the best Bloody Mary book and I highly recommend it.
I believe that you can ask Matt Robins for his recipe. If you do ask, please send me an email and I will send you his reply: maryjom2010@gmail.com.
Wednesday, October 30, 2019 11:17:10 AM EDT
My father, as a young man, worked his way through university as a bartender. He told me about a drink "the Bloody Mary" which he liked, and it was becoming very popular in the late 50's into the 60's.
At first, he made it with gin and tomato juice with vodka being the original choice.
Sometime in the mid 60's as an incentive for a new salesman, my father made the following drink for him-
4 oz tomato juice, 2 oz gin, 2 oz vodka, drop of Angostura, drop of black pepper, pinch of salt.
He told me this drink was a best seller at the college bars and all frat houses in the south. He said it made everyone do crazy stuff, but they always were a better dancer!

Cemeteries provide vaults, coffins, caskets, and urns, but do not have them on display or in stock. Customers must purchase caskets, etc. to be in their inventory.
Do you take the ashes home?
If they are burial ashes yes you take them home (it can be in a vase and you display it on a desk or bookcase, or just tuck it away). If they are cremation ashes, no - that is what the service is for - to have those released into the air (or the elements) or to be placed into an urn, and buried or kept in the family.
What if you don't have a burial or cremation service?
Then you bury or cremate them yourself. Burial is easier without the service, with or without the vault.
How long can you wait to bury the ashes?
You can keep them as long as you want. Some people wait 5 days, some wait 5 months, some wait 5 years, and some never bury or scatter the ashes.
What happens if you don't want an urn?
What does a burial space mean?
A burial space is the land in which the human or animal's body has been inserted (either interred or cremated).
What does a "burial vault" do?
As many other post

instruction: How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s?
output:
How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s? Didn't people know that a serial killer could not be all that hard to catch? When people today think that a serial killer could be one's neighbor, they're assuming that everyone in the 1970s and 80s and before was dumb enough to think a serial killer could be lurking anywhere in the world for anyone, a serial killer could be anyone, and that only 1 person could possibly be responsible for a whole string of murders. In reality, people just didn't know that much about serial killers and their methods of dispatching bodies. Back then, when a homicide happened or a murderer was on the loose, an investigator would have to actually go to the scene of the crime to see for himself or herself what sort of a mess had been made there. They would have to examine the area where the body or bodies had been found. They would have to take pictures and then they would have to send the pictures and any other pertinent information to homicide detectives in the city of the victim or victims they're trying to help. Since it was more cost effective for homicide detectives and for the police force in general to have all of their homicide detectives gather in their offices every morning to discuss their cases, cases that were already open, that was more cost effective for the police. By the time a crime scene got inspected, the crime scene would pretty much be wiped clean by the time the investigators got there. Someone who killed someone else 2 or 3 times in different parts of the world were never seen. As a matter of fact, they weren't seen by the police either, so nobody knew anything about them. So serial killers did have a free pass to kill and dispose of bodies as they liked because of the lack of modern technology. So in an era where technology was not what people have available today, people were able to perpetrate serial murders without getting caught. Today, people are caught a lot quicker. So if your wondering why you weren't informed about a serial killer by your parents or by your church when you were 10 or 12 years old, it's probably because nobody knew anything about them. The problem that's most people really faced in the 70s and 80s and before was the lack of the right technology to really help police catch and prosecute people suspected of serial killing. So the murders that happened then, people were not really informed about because they didn't have all the technology they have today. So if you're wondering why people were not informed about serial killers in the 70s and 80s and before, it's because they didn't have all of the technology available today.

While Ted only had one brother and one sister, I have only one brother and one sister. But Ted's real name was Theodore because his dad wanted to have a Theodore and so the Theodore was given to him as a middle name. And Ted grew up to hate his middle name so much he would not let anyone ever call him Theodore. He knew it wasn't a very common name but he didn't want to be called anything that even vaguely reminded him of that horrible sounding name of his. So he never revealed to anybody his middle name and he always put himself as being named Donald or James, neither of which he is. It's a nice middle name, however, and whoever gave it to him was probably a pretty well-meaning guy. Theodore is just one of those names that's a name you'd either hate or love.
But for a while, after moving to Pensacola, Florida, I actually lived next door to a guy who I was the only one in the whole town to have. Ted was living in the next neighborhood. instruction: How do I make apple juice?
output:
How do I make apple juice?
Answer: One pound of green apples will produce one quart of very palatable apple juice and will freeze to take on the character of a good apple jelly. All that is necessary is to have the good apples for that purpose, cut into small pieces, and place them in a glass jar. Put an inverted, round, flat, tin cover on it and let it stand some months. Take it out and put on a rubber plate. With a rubber funnel pour the juice directly into a bottle and cork it; then it is fit for use. Two pounds of green apples will make three quarts of applesauce. An old, rotten apple will spoil if placed in a cold cellar with the good apples, unless it is changed frequently. I keep a row of apples on a bench. The first row is for the pigs; the second is the cider, and the third row is the new apples. If old apples are put away with the cider, the apples will be spoiled in a short time. When a green apple is to be cured, just cut off from the sunny side all decayed leaves with the decayed spots from the outside of the apple. Place the apples in a cold place with plenty of ventilation or hang them in a warm and damp room. As the decayed parts ripen, cut them loose. When the apple is entirely sound in the center, with the decayed parts cured, it will be ready to put in cold storage with no more cure or cleaning.
MUSSEL MUSSELS are very good, especially with vinegar and butter. I use them as an oyster-substitute. In the spring and fall I find very large and fine mussels on the rocks. Sell them for 5 cents a dozen if picked out by the dozens. I find large scallop shells on the rocks, and often pick a number of small and very tasty oysters. I am told that this is the time for the best black perch. To catch them put out a very large hook with a light lead-line with two long, strong hooks and cast into the shallop; let them sink, take out a cast, and wind in again. I have had much success catching small speckled trout with a cast that had three-inch nails on the hooks and about 5 or 6 feet of the strongest, largest, and thickest silk line that I could find. On a sunny morning I am surprised at the number of small fish that are taken.
MIXED FRUITS I mix all the fruit in the same cellar without any difference. They ripen at the same time, and if each kind is properly kept and looked after, they will make an honest living for the owner of the cellar. It will cost about $40 to build and furnish a cold cellar to hold 150 dozen of the best fruit, one-half of which can be used for maturing sweet crab-apples without spoiling. It is quite easy to make money in fruit-growing by attention to the cellar and in keeping the fruit separate from the bad.
MULLEIN is very common in many parts, growing near the rocky hills and in the woods by the side of the roads. It has beautiful flowers, very easy to cultivate, and is soon covered with large, sweet, thick seed-heads. This is a very important and profitable weed, and a large quantity could soon be got. To cultivate, sow any good soil and cultivate for a week or ten days. Put it out, and cultivate and fertilize once a week or ten days. After a few days, sprinkle salt and lime over the soil. Let it grow a few days, and then spade it up, fertilize again, and sow seed. The seed is very free-flowing and comes easily. It takes about a year to get the first seed and to have a good head. In ten years, one can grow rich, with a little attention and good fertilizer and watering. Many a farmer washes with his mullein. I have seen him wash with it and put his pantaloons in his straw bed to keep them warm and fresh in the morning; and he was as rich as a king. Everyone knows that the stalk of the mullein, burned, makes an excellent hair-dye. I have seen an old man with a full head of white hair, and he was perfectly black with the mullein. instruction: How can I make bubble solution?
output: How can I make bubble solution? (you can't buy or make it because it's a secret ingredient) It's a common mistake to think that you can just add your bubble solution straight to the water. But that's not the case, not at all. Instead, you need to make a bubble solution, and it's the liquid that you add that makes it work. It's a chemical mixture that you can buy, if you are smart about where you buy your ingredients. It's called citric acid. This is the chemical that makes the solution work! Citric Acid Is The Secret Here's What Happens. When you add this chemical to your water, it bubbles up a little bit. And when it does that, it's bubbling because it heats the water up. When the water gets heated to around 134 degrees, the water can hold more gas within it. So it gets kind of fizzy because more gas is dissolved in the water, right? So to summarize, the water must be heated. More specifically, it must be heated up to around ¬∞ C, at which point more gas can dissolve in it, and it will work. So we know where the hot water comes from, but where does the chemical citric acid come from? The Secret Ingredient For bubble solution: Citric Acid Bubble Solution Recipe (For 1 Liter Bubble Solution) 10 grams citric acid 8 oz water Combine 10 grams citric acid in a separate beverage bottle or drink container. Add the citric acid to a spray bottle or sprinkler full of about 8 oz of water. In a different beverage bottle or water container, combine 1 cup water and 3 oz borax. Spray or sprinkle this solution all over the lawn. Or Use An Electric Mixer If You Don't Want To Add The Citric Acid With Your Hands! If You Prefer To Use Something Else Then An Electric Mixer. Add 30 grams of Borax powder to the lawn or grass. Turn on the mixer on the mixer (mix) for 30 seconds to 1 minute. Turn off the mixer. Spray or sprinkle the lawn with your home made bubble lawn solution. And that's it! Bubble Solution Done! You Are Now Ready For The Killer Bubble Science Experiments! Bubbles Science Experiments 1 Bubbles, Chemistry And Sounds ! Science Fact: Noise is made by turbulence, meaning the movement of a gas produces sound waves. Science Fact: When a lot of gas is produced in a small space, the movement becomes very energetic and fast, causing very loud noise. Sound travels through air in little waves called "sound waves." A "sound wave" is really just a fancy way to say 'vibration'. When you vibrate an electric guitar in your hand, you make a sound ! A bubble is nothing more than a big balloon ! When the bubble starts to fizzle, it's really just an ice-cube. When it sizzles, it's actually burning up! What About That Noise?! When a lot of gas is produced in a small space, the movement becomes very energetic and fast, causing very loud noises! You can easily hear this by just putting a glass over a sink and dropping some soap into it. (DON'T!) Bubbles are actually really loud because there's so much air pressure on them. To make the really loud "piercing" squeal you hear, just grip the bubble very tightly! 6. When you put a bubble on your hand then try to peel it off, you actually can't! That's like trying to peel a banana with your hands. 8. When a bubble is about to break, the air inside it gets really, really hot. It's as if it burned itself to death! 7. When a bubble breaks because the air is too hot, it fizzles up just like a small ice-cube. 4. A bubble is actually nothing more than a big balloon! The air inside helps keep the shape of the bubble. When a bubble blows outside this air cushion, all the air goes to the surface and the bubble becomes flat. 5. When it sizzles, it's actually burning up! instruction: How do I know if my house has a water leak?
output:
How do I know if my house has a water leak?
What size is the water main?
B. What size is the water main coming into the house?
C. Is the water supply from public supply or private well?
If you answer B, C, and D to the above two questions (See Water Utility Page #2) you most likely have a leak somewhere in the house, even though your water meter indicates a negative balance. You will still have to shut off the water to verify the presence of a leak. The reason is due to the time it will take to drain water from the house to the water meter.
For the purposes of the discussion on the next section on leak detection, we will assume that your water supply comes from a private well or a city or public water supply.
The most important tool to obtaining complete leak detection is a leak test kit. These kits are available from various vendors such as Lee Industrial, Water Technology, and T.A.C. Plumbing Supply.
Leaf Boots: The pipe leak detector, or ‚Äúboots‚Äù are placed over the suspected leaks or valves, to be verified.
Hydro Tester: If you use this tool you must be careful and make sure you know where and/or what type of pipe you are working on.
Water meter: Use this tool every time you stop to read your water meter. If something does not look right, or an abnormal condition is observed with a visual inspection of the area, it is probably a leak!
Water service lateral: This tool is used to check for leaks in the lateral line.
There are some important tips when leak testing.
Start the meter and note the meter reading. If you need to stop and read it several times to confirm your read, it can throw the test off the first time you stop to test the suspect leak.
If you think you have a leak, start the meter. When it does not change or when you are unsure of the reading, turn off the valve on the suspected leak and read the meter. Then, turn the valve back on, start the meter, and note the meter reading. The meter read should be less than it was when the valve was off, and hopefully, the meter should again not have changed or not change much more. If it does change, then you definitely have a leak! Note the date and time that the suspected leak was discovered. You will want to go back during normal usage to again shut the valve off, and confirm your read.
If you have a water utility, check your usage and determine if the water you are using matches what you think you are using. Also, check the temperature of your water. If your water feels colder than normally expected, but not a real low temperature, you might have a leak! If your water supply is from a private well, check the pressure meter. Is it higher than usual? If the answer is yes, you might have a leak!
What are the symptoms of a possible leak?
A. If your water comes from a private well, you might notice an abnormally high reading on the well pump (see Water Booster Pumps), or unusually cold water. This may occur if there has been unusually high demand for water (heating or cooling systems). Usually, your house will go on a well-water system backup. This is the main benefit of using a back up.
As water flows through the water heater and passes into the storage tank, it will expand as it warms up, but will then contract back down as heat and the water temperature drops. This is especially true for the cold water lines to the water heater itself. The same holds true for the tank and all of the water it holds. If the cold water entering the tank or water heater drops below 40-45 degrees (F) (sometimes below zero (F) in North Dakota, where we have very cold winters), the tank and pipes, that have not been heat isolated from this frost, will contract as they get cold. This will open up any gaps between tight fittings.
Closing the valve or opening the cold water faucet can help. Turning off the hot water supply will not make any difference. Running the hot water usually lowers the temperature enough in the tank and pipes that ice does not accumulate. If it does ice up, the freeze will usually crack the tank and shut of all of your hot water pressure. If it appears to be cold on the top of the tank, there could be frost, water leaking, or other issues. Check the water temperature and watch the water level over time. When it rises, your storage tank is leaking.

instruction: What do the different octane values of gasoline mean?
output: What do the different octane values of gasoline mean? Some people think that if you top off your tank with premium or super premium gas, the engine will get 2 mpg more per gallon. But is that really the case? Octane is a measure of gasoline ignition quality. The octane rating, or pump octane rating, in the United States is based on the amount of gas required to ignite spark plugs on a motor driven engine. A gasoline‚Äôs inherent ability to ignite is called its antiknock (AK) rating. The higher the antiknock rating, the higher the fuel‚Äôs octane rating. This means the higher the antiknock rating, the more resistance there is to preignition (spark knock) that might result from premium or super premium gasoline being used in a vehicle equipped with standard-octane gasoline. Antiknock Ratings Antiknock (AK) ratings in America are based on cylinder pressure. The higher the pressure, the greater the antiknock rating. The test is carried out on a specially built engine under carefully controlled conditions. An accelerometer on the flywheel measures the pressure in the cylinders during the compression stroke. Because the compression takes place more or less instantly, preignition would most likely be a major problem. The test determines the highest pressure that can be safely sustained. The antiknock number, or AK number, is based on the average of two consecutive readings. The AK number is based on pounds per square inch, at which a motor delivers its rated horsepower per one cubic inch displacement and uses three octane numbers, expressed in decimals, after the number for rating. E.g., a gasoline rated for 100 hp per cubic inch at 4000 rpm and 4.0 AK numbers would appear as 1004.3. The rating indicates that this gasoline can be used in a motor requiring a gasoline with 100 hp per inch, at 4000 rpm, and an antiknock number of 4.3. The 3 on the right signifies that the rating is for a 4.0 gasoline; if the rating had been for a 4.5 gasoline, this number would have been 0.3. The rating does not indicate that this motor is a straight-six, or any other particular type. The rating may apply to any of the following engines, in any number of combinations: 4-, 6-, or 8-cylinder, V-8, straight-6, or other engine configurations. In addition, if the rating were 1003.0, it indicates 3.0, AK number. The AK numbers do not signify different octane ratings; they are a means of determining the gasoline‚Äôs antiknock properties. Octane and Engines The two-stroke engine in motorcycles and the four-stroke engine in cars require two different, specific-octane gasoline. However, the four-stroke engine requires relatively low-octane gasoline. (Nearly all current low-octane gasolines can actually be used in low-grade engines, such as those found on most cars.) The average gasoline-burning car engine can operate on two-or three-octane gasoline as long as one of two rules is observed: 1. The higher two AK numbers must be less than 12.0. The AK number is based on the average of two consecutive compressions. 2. If an engine uses three different octane numbers and more than one of those numbers is greater than 7.5, then the highest number must be less than 7.5. Note: if, however, you run up to the limit, then preignition (knocking) may result. And there‚Äôs a good chance the engine will ‚Äúblow‚Äù (detonate) unless it is equipped with a ‚Äúhot‚Äù (high-compression) piston. This can happen even with low-grade (grade) unleaded gasoline because of the compression and temperature. (There is no octane rating on kerosene, and there is not even any standard way‚Äîso far‚Äîto measure its AK number.) If you have a high-performance engine, for example, an engine with a maximum compression ratio of 7.6 and an AK number requirement of 9.9, then you must use a gasoline with a minimum AK number requirement of 9.9. Octane and Kerosene and Blends For more on why a new and different form of hydrocarbon was

output:

If you feel that you can safely make the repairs yourself and are confident that you can do a good enough job to support the cost of repairs yourself, then you should consider doing the work yourself.
Asphalt is the cheapest material available. It has a certain tenaciousness, and can be applied by machine in large quantities. This is the "cold applied" method. Cold applied asphalt is generally used to make large roof repairs. Cold applied is the method of choice for large commercial or institutional buildings.
One advantage of asphalt is that the material can be made "self healing". It is possible to place a plastic membrane under the asphalt and this would allow a small amount of liquid to leak under the membrane. The liquid would be absorbed by the heated asphalt.
There are specialized roofing contractors who have cold applied systems - they offer asphalt repair kits in kit form - and they can also offer to make repairs to leaking and cracked asphalt roofs.
Asphalt is generally the least expensive repair material, and can be used to stop leaks from small repairs as well as large leaks.

7. How do you keep an aqueduct from freezing? Answer: How to make an aqueduct resistant to freezing? Temperature can affect the flow rate of water in pipes, and this can cause water to freeze and break pipes. To prevent this, the top meter of the aqueduct is at a shallow sixty degrees, to minimize water loss. An anti-freeze known as glycol is also used. Glycol has a lower freezing point than water, so as water freezes, glycol helps take up the space and keeps the pipe from breaking. The bottom twenty-five meters underground are kept naturally colder ‚Äì around 32 degrees ‚Äì to protect the aqueduct for the harsh environment.
1. How do you get water from the river? Answer: How to move water from the river to Phoenix? The Colorado River is used to carry water to cities all across the desert Southwest ‚Äì through aqueducts and pipelines. Arizona diverts water from the river through the Central Arizona Project. First, the Colorado River is diverted through a dam. The reservoir is so big that its weight can keep the water high, without a pumping system constantly working to send water through the aqueduct. The water from the reservoir is sent by gravity through a sixty-mile canal. Then, the water goes through a canal that travels over one hundred miles, but there isn‚Äôt enough water in the channel for the canal to carry water. To keep the water moving on this long route, sixty inches of concrete is put under the canal for a mile, so the canal can ‚Äúfloat‚Äù on top of this hard concrete and move water without being weighed down. Then, the water travels to the Phoenix area on another canal. Once in Phoenix, one third of the water is released as a backup, so if a break occurs to part of the canal, there is still enough water to use at the cities.
How do you build a city in a desert? Answer: How to build the perfect suburban city in the desert? When you want to build a suburban city far away from the city centers, there are challenges to overcome, including costs and supplies. To create a Phoenix ‚Äúfrom the desert‚Äù, the land had to be bought and transported over 800 miles from the Mojave Desert to the new city site. This is similar to the aqueduct: water was transported across 400 miles from the Central Valley. Transporting the land caused problems: when moving the earth, if you dig too deep, you dig into sandstone; if you dig too shallow, the land moves as the water evaporates from the ground. A lot of time and money went into moving the land. The land was transported in 7,300 railroad cars, each holding 60,000 cubic feet of material! With all the land being moved, there were also challenges of getting water and power to the site. Finally, with the land in place, there were many challenges to building a civilization in the desert. One of the first challenges was growing vegetation, since Phoenix is at a higher elevation than any of the cities around it, it gets colder at night and planting vegetation in the winter can be frozen by snow. To combat this, plastic tunnels of greenhouse-like construction were built across the entire city to give the plants a warmer night and allow them to continue growing. The tunnels made it possible for all sorts of plants to thrive and grow without being frozen or unable to get enough water in this desert environment.
1. What are the biggest challenges to building a city in the desert? How do you prevent plants from freezing? Why is it advantageous for a city to have no winter? Answer: How to move cities to deserts? Once you‚Äôve transported your large amount of land to your city site, you‚Äôve begun

instruction: I have my grandfather's antique fountain pen and a bottle of ink, but have never done this before. Can you tell me how to refill the fountain pen?
output:
I have my grandfather's antique fountain pen and a bottle of ink, but have never done this before. Can you tell me how to refill the fountain pen? It' s been over forty years since I've used one. Thanks in advance for‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
You might have to read some old books on fountain pens to do it but I have found a couple of ways to make it easier to reside a pen. I am not sure if what I‚Äôm recommending is what you are doing or what, but I‚Äôll try. Firs‚Ä¶t of all let us beware that this is the original and unmodified design. Read the instructions, if not in your hand already. Don‚Äôt make modifications. Be sure to read the instructions as there are a lot of pitfalls. You‚Äôve got some old ink that‚Äôs a color you like. You don‚Äôt want to waste a drop but you don‚Äôt have a bottle of that color. I will tell you what to do but it is a little complicated. I will assume that it is a dip-proof nib or that a convertor ring will do the trick. You have two different bottles and you want to try to get one colored ink that matches closely to the others. You will need an eye dropper or three. A catheter that you don‚Äôt need any more for a different procedure. You will need a paper bag. Make sure it is big and strong. I will also assume that you will be using an ink that doesn‚Äôt need to be filtered with a filter. It will be in the instructions but read it anyway. Place the pen point down on a sheet of paper where it cannot spread and put a dot of ink and draw straight, not curved, a line with the tip of the pen. Use a marker to place a straight line at a certain distance. It would be from the center of the nib. With the bottle of colored ink, fill a clean bottle with a spout. Then fill the eye dropper with enough of the color that it is brimming. If you don‚Äôt have enough, you need to decide if you are going to use a third bottle. This is a fountain pen and I don‚Äôt think they were all made at the same time so I don‚Äôt know if the first filling you will get any old writing fluid from your ink bottle or not. If not, stop filling now. Now pour in enough of a different color to make it different, but close enough to match the third bottle. There is a good deal of experimentation necessary here to make up for the lack of modern ink. You only need a little to be safe that you will have enough for the next step. Now fill the second bottle with the color you can‚Äôt get. It will be a close match with some darkening. It is a little darker than the third bottle. The third bottle will be a good match to the original bottle. Add enough of the second bottle to fill the eye dropper in your left hand. In your right hand, use the paper bag and tie it with a knot to close it. It needs to be close to your left hand so I would recommend you don‚Äôt cross your arms. The opening of your arm should be close to your hand. Now take the pen and let it drip so the nib will dip and drip. The eye dropper is filled with the correct ink and so is the bottle on the pen. Be ready for the first drop to come and fill it. It will be full. Take the catheter and place it in the second bottle of ink until it is full. Now you are ready to do the experimentation. I would recommend making three or four lines using all the ink you have on hand. It will be three colors. When you are satisfied with the color, you are ready to refill. Put a drop in the tip and use it to drip onto a paper until it is empty. Wait a few seconds and then put another drop. You don‚Äôt want to wait long or you will be diluting the color by not having enough ink but you don‚Äôt want to put three drops for one line. It takes the correct mix to get the color you want and so you have to experiment. Put the dropper in the bottle and fill it until about a half inch is left. Add enough of the second color to mix with the original color, more of it than you did for the third color. It should turn out darker because the three colors are more diluted. Take the pen and let the nib drip. Don‚Äôt take the catheter away until it is almost empty. You will know when it is the right time to take it out.

instruction: Hi, I'd like to play ice hockey. Can you explain how the game works?
output: Hi, I'd like to play ice hockey. Can you explain how the game works? OK. As you can see, this is a hockey rink, the object of the game is to score more goals than the other team. We will play 5 periods of 15 minutes each and there will be 1 break of 15 minutes for our players. When the hockey game starts, you have 35 seconds to shoot on goal. We can only use 5 players on the ice at one time. You need to work as a team to get the ball into the 2 net points. When you get the ball in your net point, you will have 35 seconds to shoot on goal! OK. Let the game begin! The referee blows the whistle. The other team is attacking the goal, they put the ball in the hockey net and then they pass it to their goalie. The goalie stops the ball but the defence team is not able to hold on to the ball. The other team shoots on goal but they miss the net. The referee blows the whistle and the break starts now! Hi, can you give us some water? It's very hot! Hi how was it? A bit boring but we enjoyed learning how to play hockey! Hi, I'd like you to pay attention when I ask you to do something. What's your name? OK. It's very hot, so let's go and have a cup of tea! OK. Everyone gets some water! Ice cream! OK, let's go back to school now! The break is over! Hi, how was your break? Was it very hot? Yes, it was so hot that we could hardly do anything. I think it's great though, having a break every afternoon! OK, can we start again please? Hi, can you explain the scoring rules? OK. First team scoring 2 goals wins! You can't score if a player gets the ball in his own net! OK, let's play. The other team is attacking the goal, they put the ball in the hockey net. They also can pass it to their goalie. The next pass is to‚Ä¶ the defender! OK, let's keep playing for a while. We'll ask the teachers if we can carry on playing during the next break. OK, we can start again please. Hi! Are you enjoying the hockey game? Yes! Can I have some pencil and paper? Yes Please! We can pause the game for a long time if you want to write down some of the rules we learnt! Hi, we're ready to start again! Hi, can you say what you learnt? What? What? Yes, what the other team does. Well OK then. The other players try their best to keep the ball away from you but when they lose it, you get the ball from the other team. How many players are on the field? 11. How many on your team? We played 11! The object of the game is to score more goals than the other team! Yes! Let's play again please. Can you explain how the game works? Hi Can you explain what we did last time? Yes. I think. Hi, have you got the rules down? Hi The other team is winning, the other players do their jobs. Goalie! OK hi, can you explain the scoring rules? There‚Äôs no way you can score if a player gets the ball in to his net But when a player gets a goal we can give them a goalie. It‚Äôs 5 to 0 at the moment Can we have a break now please? Hi, the game has started again can you explain to me the rules please? OK. Hi, this is an ice hockey game. You need to work as a TEAM to get the ball into the net points. When you get the ball into your net point you get 35 seconds. Goal! OK, the game has restarted. What‚Äôs the other team doing? They want to pass the ball into the net points. OK hi! I have a question can you repeat the rules? Can you explain the rules again please? The players try their best to keep the ball away from you. But when they get the ball right they pass it to their goalie. And when we get the goals right and you can give us a goal! OK Hi! We need to play this game again. Can you explain? Yes, I can. This was a game we played. It's called Ice Hockey, it‚Äôs a very fun game and we play it every Sunday afternoon. You need to work as a team to score more goals than the other team. When you get your goal, you have 35 seconds and if you score 2 goals in a row, you win

instruction: What is kevlar made out of?
output:
What is kevlar made out of?
A: Kevlar is a synthetic fiber. It is a polymer produced from terephthalic acid, phenolic reaction products, and aromatic polycarbonate units.. The terephthalate monomer.
Categories: ACRYLICS SHEETS, Others, Sheets.
Keep in mind that the kevlar used for bulletproof vests is manufactured into yarn, then woven together. You can buy kevlar sheets that will protect from stabs, but the ones i have seen are not stab proof unless the sheet covers the whole area including the back of the neck and back of the head.
This kevlar is not bulletproof. To be bulletproof, you need at least 1200dtex and only a few things are bulletproof. In any case, Kevlar is a type of Aramid fiber which can stop many bullets and cut through the body of a person fairly easy.
A bullet proof vest or also called a bullet resistant vest or body armor is a specialized type of body armor used to protect the wearer from gunfire and from shrapnel. They are worn by soldiers, police, officers, security officers, and other members of the military, as well as by civilians and executives.
Find Kevlar Floor covering from JM Flooring Supply. We offer excellent prices on high quality products.
Kevlar is a light fabric-like material, but incredibly strong in high impacts. It is made from a polymer called aramid. It was the first fully synthetic fiber to be produced commercially.
Glass fiber is another material used to make ballistic panels. For example, the Delta Plate and other products, made by PelaStar, are sold for vehicle armor purposes.Their products contain laminar glass fiber, making it almost bulletproof, and they claim no ballistic piercing (which does not necessarily mean the armor is impenetrable).
Different Types of Kevlar Used in Bulletproof Vests. A popular brand name for Kevlar is Kevlar 29, which can be manufactured into various bulletproof vests.Kevin 11 bulletproof vest is another good example of a bulletproof vest manufactured of the Kevlar 11 material.
Follow this tutorial to create your own bulletproof vest by using sheets of kevlar material - the same material used in bulletproof . This vest will not stop a bullet, but it should stop a serious stabbing.

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Hong Kong  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Tong Sui?
output:
I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Hong Kong  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Tong Sui? Thank you.
Answer: Tong Sui is the Cantonese name for egg tarts. While it sounds like a Chinese dessert it is not. It actually came to Hong Kong from Macau by way of Portugal.
So how did an egg tart become an important symbol of the SAR? It is said that the government was so hard up that they decided to use Hong Kong tarts to raise funds.
The name of the dessert derives from its main ingredient, egg yolks. Egg yolks are not permitted to be imported into mainland China because of its high protein content. This has a special meaning for Hongkongers who are very proud of their unique cultural identities, and egg tarts are one of them. Many Hongkongers would probably feel the same about the Chinese mainland.
In the Hong Kong tarts, the crust and filling are made from the same ingredients, both made from flour. One would not say the crust is better than the filling. In fact it is very important for a perfect egg tart to have a crust that is slightly burnt. The secret is in the oven. The egg tarts also need to be well chilled.
So how do you make this Chinese dessert? Take a clean plastic bag and put your egg yolks in, then tie up the bag and shake it vigorously. The result, you hold in your hands a ball of egg yolks, that just begs to be turned into an egg tart.
To make the egg crust, whisk the egg yolks and sugar together, then stir in the flour, salt and butter. Shape into an 8 inch round and line with baking paper.
Line a baking tin (for a 17cm tart) with shortcrust (or puff) pastry, blind bake for 30 minutes then bake for another 30 minutes. Allow to cool.
Make the filling by mixing the rest of the ingredients together and spoon into the tart case.
Place back into the oven for another 5 minutes or until the egg becomes slightly more set inside.
In the end, make sure you have someone to share the treat with!
And another tasty SAR dish? I'm so embarrassed, but I can't remember. Can you help?
My parents live in the U.K. and visit often; usually for several weeks at a time. I usually take them around Hong Kong and Kowloon to the places they want to go and in the process, I hope to also learn more about these parts of Hong Kong.
I used to live in a public housing apartment in Aberdeen where my parents would sometimes visit. This apartment was built by the British in the early 20th Century. I was once told that originally, Aberdeen was where the European powers were to meet up.
My mother told me, though, that my grandfather, a British soldier, used to frequent Aberdeen. I found this hard to believe; my grandfather died before I was born. But it could be true. My grandfather's father, who was born in the early 1900s, apparently married a Chinese woman from Hong Kong.
My grandfather, a British soldier, and his Chinese wife lived in Canada, then eventually the U.K. He is buried in the U.K., not China or Canada. His wife's family did emigrate from Hong Kong to Canada before the Second World War. I don't know if my grandfather's wife is still living in Canada or not.
I have never been to Canada to visit my grandfather's grave or the house where he lived with his wife. I was never very close to my grandfather. I did however spend time with the Chinese side of my family in Vancouver Canada, my grandfather's native land.
Some things I learned from my grandfather's Chinese wife's family were how to knit (it's been years now though), play cards and even a bit of cooking (I still use the knitting patterns and recipes today); so these are all things my mother did not teach me (I'm guessing, though, my mother learned these things from her mother).
I'm also reminded that my mother is not a Hong Kong native. She was born in Victoria where my grandfather lived. She's a Canadian citizen.
But, I'm

How to Get Rid of Weeds: A few weedkillers do a fantastic job, including Preen.
How to Get Rid of Weeds: You can also get weed cloth which blocks light and keeps weeds from growing.
How to Get Rid of Weeds: I like to use a weed fabric called Weed Blank. You don‚Äôt have to pull it back or cut it up to get rid of it. You just dig up to the soil line and plant. When you harvest, dig up below the soil line again to get rid of weeds, but you can cut the weed material off with a pair of shears. This can be laid out on the soil to block light when you have weeds.
Most weed cloth can also be sown, in other words with a thin weed fabric you can grow crops so that it just covers the soil.
How to Get Rid of Weeds: If you are doing large commercial gardening, there are a lot of weed killers like Roundup that are effective.
How to Get Rid of Weeds: I would never use Roundup without a mask, unless by a stream. It is a bad idea to get that on your skin, and you also don‚Äôt want to use it around your children, unless of course they are playing in the stream.
How to Get Rid of Weeds: The best thing to do is do it by hand. The soil can start to get weedy as time goes on, and it becomes a cycle of you have to pull the weeds and then replant. The other thing to use is to just lay down a fabric to cover it or put mulch.

The best time of year to plant in many places is around March. You can have a great season, but if you don‚Äôt have enough light it could be an issue. In the summer, light becomes a problem. You need to plan for 12 hours of light. In the first week of April, you can use lights, and if you can get light before that, you can. instruction: Is human blood ever any color other than red?
output:
Is human blood ever any color other than red? How did they come to know in ancient times that red equals, human? In ancient times blood was red (not the color of it today) because of the high concentration of hemoglobin which is an iron based protein. Hemoglobin is also responsible in the human circulatory system as it picks up and delivers oxygen t..
If Blood Is Blue Color It
If Blood Is Blue Color It, Does This Mean That You Might Have A Blood Type Which Normally Would Not Be Expected? Answer. No. The common blood type A, most often with the Rhesus positive determination, is the very most common of all blood types among humans. Blue blood is also common, but almost always the color is from being mixed with a larger amount of other blood types, rather than being its own unique separate blood type. ..
If I Have A Positive Blood Type Should I Still Get A Blood Type Test If I Get Sick?
If I Have A Positive Blood Type Should I Still Get A Blood Type Test If I Get Sick? Blood types are helpful, but they're not going to give you much information if you get sick. Most sicknesses are not due to a blood type mismatch, which means that you are fine with your blood type and don't need to go to the doctor or do anything special. If you need a blood transfusion, most blood banks will match the red blood cells from donors wi..
How Old Is The Blood Typing Test How Does Testing Work To Find Out My Blood Type?
How Old Is The Blood Typing Test How Does Testing Work To Find Out My Blood Type? The technology behind blood typing does not allow scientists to find out your blood type by running your blood through a machine. To find out your specific blood type we have been running blood types. Somebody born in the 21st century has a blood type that's different from somebody born in the 18th or 19th century. While your blood type has techn..
If Blood Types Only Go To 12 Why Is There So Much Talk About A1-60 Blood Typing?
If Blood Types Only Go To 12 Why Is There So Much Talk About A1-60 Blood Typing? Because it's helpful to know about it! There are some people out there who have a rare variant that has an extra letter in their blood type. For example, somebody with blood type A1-60 has an A antigen and a B antibody instead of the standard A antigen and B antibody. The "1" is extra. So, having a "1" in your blood type means that you're special. It..
Blood Typing For A Blood Transfusion
Blood Typing For A Blood Transfusion Blood typing is a very important part of transfusions. Since humans have a limited number of blood types and the ability to transfuse blood successfully is limited, blood type plays an enormous role in the safety of blood transfusions. But the blood type test is not simply a way to make sure that the blood coming inside matches the patient perfectly...
What Does Blood Typing Look Like?
What Does Blood Typing Look Like? When scientists test your blood to find out your blood type, they test for the presence of antigens and antibodies. To do this test, they put your blood into a machine to separate out the different particles in the blood. The blood is then put onto different test strips that each test for the presence of one antigen or one antibody at a time. The results are put into a computer and the computer ..
Do I Need One Or Two Blood Types To Survive?
Do I Need One Or Two Blood Types To Survive? Actually, the human body can survive on most blood types, even blood type O. It is only the Rhesus negative blood that's unable to survive when mismatched with other blood types. Most sicknesses are not due to a blood type mismatch, which means that you are fine with your blood type and don't need to go to the doctor or do anything special. Blood typing is important only in rare situation..

instruction: What are some herbs I can dry out?
output:
What are some herbs I can dry out?
For drying and preserving herbs, the best technique is freeze-drying; this method results in the dry, tasteless dried material that can be rehydrated at any time. It is the dried material that should be stored in airtight containers that are protected from moisture and light. Rehydrating the herb is very simple, with the herb being placed in boiling water; usually a larger amount of boiling water is used than is needed, so extra water is used to ensure complete rehydration and that the herb maintains its flavor for the following days in the boiling pot.
Other methods of drying plants involve the use of heat and pressure, which may be desirable for certain herbs. Dried material from these methods may be moister and stale; if this occurs, it may be rehydrated by soaking in water and straining. If the material is stale, it will not be suitable for use in food. For most herbs, however, freeze-drying is used.
This entry was posted in Home and Gardening and tagged Drying, Gardening, Herbs. Bookmark the permalink.

instruction: Where is Indonesia?
output:
Where is Indonesia? (1) Where is Indonesia located? (2) Where is Indonesia, and in the Indian Ocean, is located the tiny nation of Timor? Answer: (1) Asia; (2) East of Australia Near Indonesia lies the tiny nation of Timor. When East Timor declared independence in 2002, it was accepted by Indonesia only after a brief period of violence. Now that peace has settled over Timor, it is ready to develop itself. But the nation is so small and weak, it has to depend on others for its economy, trade, infrastructure and development. A New Nation Timor will have to be careful now that it will not come under the influence of bigger nations like Portugal, China, Japan, or even Indonesia, which only a few years ago was East Timor‚Äôs ruler. With the help of the international community, East Timor plans to work towards becoming a better place to live in.
This is a presentation about timor easte timor
The history of TIMOR
Became a colony of Portugal in 1556. Indonesia invaded in 1975 and was recognized in Australia as an independent state.
EAST TIMOR (ORIENTAL MAP)
East Timor is known as the country of 3-day war. Between 6-9th September 1999, an area of 40,000ha was burnt. 300K homes and 400K acres of land were destroyed. This caused the deaths of 27K people, including 10K civilian. East Timor is also known as "the country of the martyrs" because of its rich traditions and culture of fighting for liberating their country despite the Indonesia's 24 years occupation. East Timor‚Äôs capital is Dili. It's population is 85 % Roman Catholics. The history of East Timor is full of conflict and violence.

The History of East Timor History of eastern Indonesia
The East Timor conflict escalated in 1975. Indonesia fought an invasion war between 1975 and 1979, but after a 10-year resistance, East Timor declared its independence in 1999. Independence is the freedom to rule and run one place without foreign intervention. Independence is a very rare concept in East Timor. Indonesia became a nation in 1945. They decided to take over other parts of the country such as, Irian Barat (West New Guinea) and East Timor, and became colonisers. The invasion was a difficult one both in East Timor and in West New Guinea. A man named Jos√© Abrantes Pereira, was a Timorese hero, he was killed by the Indonesian army in the 1975 war. In this war the Indonesians, were the invaders, the Timorese were the defenders. In this war the Timorese soldiers fought with their machetes and wooden spears. The Portuguese, who used to administer East Timor, did not like the Indonesian government. The Indonesian government has been the leader of East Timor since Portugal left East Timor in 1999.

EAST TIMOR: A LONG ROAD TO GOVERNOMENT Independence Day Celebra
The independence of Timor-Leste (East Timor) took place on 16 May, 2002. Independence was the result of prolonged struggle (1988-1991) for freedom after 22 years of colonization and oppression under the Indonesian government.

This is what it says: ‚ÄúThe volume of a cube is 20 cubic inches. This cube is covered with small squares which are 1/16 of an inch each on all sides. Find the area of a 20 sided die.‚Äù
Can you help me do that? (It doesn‚Äôt say if it‚Äôs the area under a curve or something. I think it‚Äôs the area of a square with 20 sides.)
You add a dimension, so you'll need Pi, 20 in diameter. Do the algebra:
You will first need to use the definition of Area to get the equation a + 20 = 20 * s. This will allow you to solve for a. You will need a variable so I will call it 'b'. A equation would look something like this:
a = 20b or a = 20(s/20)
We can then solve for Area (a) by substituting the unknown letter with the equation that was determined and solving for Area which would look something like:
Area = 20 * b
The Area would look something like this: Area = 400 b
You would need to solve for all of the unknown letters in order to solve. The answer would look something like this: Area = 400b.

"In response to the new post: ... What are u going to do with them when all is said and done?"
I really appreciate seeing the post on making the blinds. I have some that I would like to make after a quick refresher course on how they are put together. I will make it a goal to make more.
I have made them too . they are in my window.
I really didn't think I was going to be one to post on "how to" make window blind from a print, but here it the my take on it, and there will be follow ups. The first thing you have to do is take the printed window blind and cut out the windows. Now you can see where the trouble starts. First off it will have to be cut out in a computer. I have not tried that yet. I also have not tried cutting those windows just above the window size, I have however cut the window size out first and then trimmed everything in between the window size, with a razor blade and scissors. This way it keeps everything clean and easy to follow. The blinds come with string holes in almost every corner. Now I just run the string through those holes, this will make it easier to install. You will find a way to make the blinds hinged from the top, but beware, it is not difficult, in some areas you have to cut the fabric out before you can attach the hinges. This takes some patience on the part of the user. Now for this instructable I will have to explain the other way. The blinds I made are like a canvas blind, it is made out of 1 square of fabric with a couple of holes in it for string. It is fastened together in the middle, which makes it not hinged at the top , but I have done this in the past and have found it works great. I just fold the blind in the middle where it is fastened and hang it in the window. This will be the instructable I mention above so you can see how it works and look forward to part 2. That way I don't post everything now then you have to wonder how I got the print in the first place, so that is why I didn't make an instructable on that, you will have to look for the other instructable to know the print way, just follow the link I give for it. Now on to the pictures showing the process. I have a picture coming up of how to cut it out on a computer.
Thanks for the comments about your Instructables on this topic. It has been an issue for quite some time. The problem is not so much that the instructions are hard to follow, it's that most of them are out of date. I have decided to make a series of Instructables on this same topic and I am redoing all the ones that I can find outdated. I have discovered that there are two versions of these available. One is only one piece of fabric that wraps around the outside of the wooden dowel. The second version is one piece of fabric that is wrapped then is connected to the other side by means of a hinged mechanism.
It's the second version I'm looking for and I can tell you that the one with the dowel is easier to make, but harder to hang because they are thinner and more fragile and more likely to be damaged by a rope or chain and less likely to be hung in the spring or fall during severe weather. The version with the dowel is almost exclusively used in Europe. I'm looking for the version with the hinged mechanism that is often used here in the Unites States.
I'll probably be creating two Instructables. The first will be on the "simpler version" and the other will be on the more desirable hinged version. It won't be hard. Just have to do a little thinking to figure out how a person does this thing that has been forgotten about.
The more complex version (the one with the dowel) is called Sun Shade Maker in many

instruction: I want to talk about "Smooth",  a song by Rob Thomas.
output:
I want to talk about "Smooth",  a song by Rob Thomas.
My favourite song is "Smooth",  that song by Rob Thomas.
In the song the singer sings about a lady with a "smooth, smooth, smooth, smooth/smooth, smooth, smooth, smooth" face.
But the singer also admits that the woman is not his type:
She's wearing tight sweaters at the bar
And I am wearing sweatpants
I'm on the cover of GQ
I'm never going outside again
He admits that the lady is "not all that he wants", that she is "wearing tight sweaters at the bar", but still says that he loves her face, which "smooths, smooths, smooths".
In fact, that is my favourite song - it talks about something I am experiencing every day.
The thing is that the singer wants a woman with a "smooth, smooth, smooth, smooth" face. But that lady doesn't have it at all. She loves jeans and sweatpants, and is not going outside anymore - she never walks or hikes, or does any physical things. She also drinks, does some drugs and is not interested in doing something about it.
And this woman is not smooth: if you ask me, she is fat and smells like smoke and alcohol. That's why the singer doesn't want her. But he does love something from this woman - her face.
She probably has a pretty, lovely face with a sweet smile, but she wears no makeup, she has no pretty, sexy clothing. She doesn't look like the kind of woman a man would desire in the morning - with lashes and long, light-brown hair, pretty, sexy clothing and perfume. No, that's not a woman who can be desired.
It's a lot of lucky circumstances that she looks good: she has a pretty face, which she loves to wear makeup but she doesn't because she doesn't really care. And her hair is healthy, long and the colour is nice, too - she also doesn't care so much about it.
But the lucky circumstances are also that her facial beauty doesn't look like a cheap, fake one. It's natural, without some kind of makeup that make you look younger, that you want to attract men - you look feminine, girlish and not like a hardened, sexist woman. That's her good luck. She looks feminine, but it's not cheap, fake femininity, it's true femininity.
The only thing left to talk what this woman doesn't like to do is exercise. It's not a feminine thing to take care of your body and mind. A female can take care of her body and mind at home - without any effort. But it would also mean that she has no other interests in life than that. She does have other interests in life. It's just that she is not interested in taking care of her body or mind at all.
She is the way she is, just because she doesn't need to take care of herself. Because that's not really necessary.
She takes care of her children, she loves her man. If she gets ill or fat later in life, it's probably because she has no man anymore and has no time for him, either.
So that's a woman, probably. That's the best way I can describe it. But that woman is not a woman who really cares about taking care of herself - she looks good in the morning, but after that she usually wears something simple that does not attract much attention, because she doesn't care about looking good.
She is a mother, too. She cares about her children, and that makes her a good woman.
It's pretty common. Many ladies look that way. It's very hard to find a woman who is interested in dressing up, wearing makeup and doing something with herself. This can be a woman who is good-looking and is interested in looking good, and a woman who is plain and doesn't care about the way she looks.
And it's probably why the singer of the song "Smooth",  does not like the way his lady looks. After all, she does not care enough to take good care of herself, and she is not good-looking. And that's not what we men really look at in a women. It's the femininity - looking elegant, classy and beautiful.
It's true:
A smooth woman is not a woman who looks like it took some efforts,

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Bolivian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Chola Sandwich?
output: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Bolivian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Chola Sandwich? Thank you, it is sure to go along with a few nice wines at my house with guests. A Chola Sandwich is just a baguette toasted and crusted, with your favorite meat on the top of the bread, just like the sandwiches they serve in France. A good quality baguette like a French baguette is preferred; and with a squeeze of lime, it is just perfect. To make the Chola Sandwich: a perfect sliced bread sandwich is the one where the bread is not too thick  or crust is burnt; it should be just right. I like to toast and crunch the French baguette. After toasting it completely, spread some butter or mayonnaise just a little; and with  the sliced bread that is not too thick, this sandwich is perfect. And this Chola Sandwich can be served as an open sandwich, as well with the butter or mayonnaise.  105  I like to make this sandwich as an open sandwich with some quality cold cuts like Italian cold cuts. So, spread the Italian cold cuts just across the bread, and if you prefer, you can make it as a closed sandwich by placing the meat in the middle of the slice of bread.  I make this Chola Sandwich with my favorite beef, like an Italian beef with onions & beef; it is just perfect with the French bread of the baguette, and I just cannot say no to this sandwich. The recipe is simple and  a little time consuming, but it is good. To make this sandwich: this recipe needs a little time to get the perfect balance of flavors. Put some beef, onions, salt, pepper,  and rosemary together; and get it to the boiling point. Turn off the heat and let it sit a little, so the beef gets fully flavored. Remove the onions and put the beef in the pot to boil for a little bit longer. After some time remove the  beef from the heat and drain the water from the beef; and then place the beef in a cold water for about five minutes. Soak the beef for this amount of time, and then fry the beef with some oil in the pan, the same oil in which you boiled the beef. And then after your beef is fried with  some oil, drain the oil from it. 112  It is better to make this recipe with some leftover cold cuts, like the cold cuts are really good and  you can take any good quality cold cuts and make the Chola Sandwich. I like to make this in a pan and then make this into an open sandwich, because the way I make it, the onion in the beef adds special  flavor. So while the onion is in with the beef, you just fry the bread until browns are done. With my French baguettes, this bread browsns a perfect bit in about two minutes. The French baguette  is what I usually use for the sandwich; but you can use other kinds of bread like Italian, and a good quality bread. And then you can sprinkle some salt, pepper and rosemary and the other herbs if your like. And then make an open sandwich and eat it like that, because eating it with bread and meat is just perfect and is just what I like.  113  I am making the Chola Sandwich again, it is really good and very simple. So I am making some nice beef with onions, salt, pepper and  rosemary. Put some beef, onions, salt and pepper together in the pot and get it to the boiling point. Turn off the heat and let it sit a little bit,  so the beef gets fully flavored, and then remove the onions so that the beef gets flavored and drained. Put the beef in the colling water and soak for about five minute after you drain the water. And then place the beef with  some oil in the pan and fry the beef and drain the oil completely. You can eat this like an open sandwich or close it as a sandwich altogether.  And then for this recipe you can take any good quality cold cuts that are available for the sandwich in the refrigerator. You can take any

instruction: Can you give any tips on how to cook a juicy, medium-rare steak?
output:
Can you give any tips on how to cook a juicy, medium-rare steak? If youre grilling the meat, take the temperature of the meat and make your adjustments to cook it to your desired temperature. If your steak is still frozen from the fridge, it will take approximately 30 minutes per pound to thaw it. Once thawed, you can either pat it dry or make a marinade to help tenderize the meat. I would suggest you marinate your meat for at least 30 mikes, you could marinate it any longer than this, it wont hurt it. If youre grilling the meat, take the temperature of the meat and make your adjustments to cook it to your desired temperature.
Simply season your meat, and let it sit on the kitchen counter or in the refrigerator for a couple of hours, or even overnight. Dont wash it before cooking either! You can cut some fat off now, though, if you wish. While your steak is sitting you can make the marinade if you want. Wrap the meat in aluminum foil, and place it in a roasting pan. Dont bother with a sear or a crust, that will be done on the grill. The meat should rest for about ten minutes before serving. If you make a steak house sandwich, your meat should be thick and rare. However, the steak should be at least an inch thick or it probably will dry out when broiled. If you eat your steak hot in the store or at a restaurant, then it will cook on the inside quicker because it has already been cooked. Most of the steak stores today will cook the meat in a broiler and then serve it off a hot griddle. If you do not cook your steak at home, make sure you get a piece that is at least 5/8 to 3/4 of an inch thick. Certainly, if you order it that way in a steak house, they can do that, too. However, since it is a big chunk off a cow, it takes a long time to cook, so it is better to order it medium rather than a very, very rare steak.

The S&W Model 10-6 revolver is a large frame, 6-shot double-action revolver. It was made from 1949 until 1976 (though it was discontinued in 1965 and reintroduced in 1972), but the only years in which it was made in large quantities was 1950 through 1955. It was made of stainless steel, hardened stainless steel (a variant made by International Sporting Arms), or matte blued steel. The barrel is made of steel, unlike the Model 66 and Model 12.
It is a very stout revolver, similar in many ways to the Colt Python (.357 Magnum revolver) and Smith & Wesson Model 12 (.44 Magnum) Model 12 (.44 Magnum). However, it differs in that it is slightly shorter, about .5 in (12.7 mm) shorter than the Model 12, and it has a 7 1‚ÅÑ2 in barrel (for comparison, the Model 12 barrel length is 7 3‚ÅÑ4 in or 196 mm). However, it also does not handle as well as the Model 12 since the longer barrel of the Model 12 allows the six-inch barrel to be balanced perfectly, whereas the balancing is off on the 6-inch 10-6. The 10-6 has a wooden grip that differs slightly from that of the Model 12 and Model 66.
The revolver is intended for large- frame .38 special +P cartridges. While some .38 S&W cartridges were also used in the 1949-1965 variants, only modern large- frame .38 +P cartridges are used. Modern large-frame cartridges used in this revolver include:
.357 Magnum (.357 Mag +P)
.41 Magnum (.41 Mag +P and .41 Mag +P+ cartridges)
.44 Magnum (.44 Mag +P+ cartridges)
The Smith & Wesson Model 10-6 .38 Special revolver was produced from 1949 until 1976, with the first 4 years production during the era of World War II (1941-1945). In those first 4 years production, Smith & Wesson produced approximately 100,000 Model 10-6 revolvers. When the Korean War began in 1950, and as a result of World War II, it was common for Americans to buy firearms for personal defense. During this time, S&W and Colt manufactured a number of "Wartime Models". These revolvers are identical except that they have "WARTIME MODEL" stamped on the left side of the frame over the trigger. Production of the Model 10-6 ceased in August 1955 and was reintroduced in April 1972. It was then discontinued again in 1976. 25,800 total Model 10-6 revolvers were manufactured (including the reintroduced variant).
